Maturity Modelling

Source: R/04_maturity.R
maturity_HTP.Rd

Maturity Modelling

Usage

maturity_HTP(x, index = "GLI", canopy = "Canopy", plot_id = NULL, ...)

Arguments

x

An object of class read_HTP, containing the results of the read_HTP() function.

index

A string specifying the canopy trait to be modeled. Default is "GLI".

canopy

A string specifying the canopy trait to be modeled. Default is "Canopy".

plot_id

An optional vector of plot IDs to filter the data. Default is NULL, meaning all plots are used.

...

Additional arguments passed to the modeler_HTP() function.

Value

An object of class modeler_HTP, which is a list containing the following elements:

param

A data frame containing the optimized parameters and related information.

dt

A data frame with the corrected and possibly zero-augmented canopy data.

fn

The call used to calculate the AUC.

max_time

Maximum time value used for calculating the AUC.

Examples

library(exploreHTP)
data(dt_potato)
results <- read_HTP(
  data = dt_potato,
  genotype = "Gen",
  time = "DAP",
  plot = "Plot",
  traits = c("Canopy", "GLI_2"),
  row = "Row",
  range = "Range"
)
mat <- maturity_HTP(
  x = results,
  index = "GLI_2",
  canopy = "Canopy",
  plot_id = c(195, 40)
)
plot(mat, plot_id = c(195, 40))

print(mat)
#> 
#> Call:
#> GLI_2 ~ fn_lin_pl_lin2(time, t1, t2, dt, k, beta) 
#> 
#> Sum of Squares Error:
#>      Min.   1st Qu.    Median      Mean   3rd Qu.      Max. 
#> 1.024e-05 1.768e-04 3.435e-04 3.435e-04 5.101e-04 6.767e-04 
#> 
#> Optimization Results `head()`:
#>  plot  genotype   t1   t2   dt     k    beta      sse  auc   t3
#>    40 W17043-37 36.9 66.4 13.4 0.369 -0.0106 6.77e-04 16.6 79.9
#>   195  W16219-8 39.6 68.3 25.1 0.323 -0.0100 1.02e-05 16.4 93.3
#> 
#> Metrics:
#>  Plots      Timing Convergence Iterations
#>      2 0.7707 secs        100% 341 (plot)
#>
